body:
When I add external package in `packages.yaml`, I see that the package appears in `spack find` list.
Is this expected? `spack uninstall` gives below message:

``` bash
spack uninstall openmpi
.....
==> Removed stale DB entry for openmpi@develop%clang@7.3.0-apple~mxm~pmi~psm~psm2~slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm~verbs+vt arch=darwin-elcapitan-x86_64-aqwhvoz
```

If this is expected behaviour, then we can close this ticket.
title: "Removed stale DB entry for packageXX" (for external package)
